description: Fusion is the main antagonist of PreCure All Stars DX. As his name suggests, he is a fusion of the vanquished Zakenna, Uzaina, Kowaina, and Hoshiina and has the ability to absorb power and make it into his own. In New Stage, he survives and retrogrades back to a little fairy named Fuu-chan, where he is discovered by Ayumi.
name: Fusion
